ComicInfo.Summary:
Vampirella has tracked her prey, the bloodthirsty Vlad Dracula, to Seattle and a vicious nest of vampires preying on the young and the lost. In the clutches of Le Fanu—one of Dracula's oldest and most trusted lieutenants — Vampirella must face a growing threat more terrifying than any she has ever encountered... for Le Fanu has exposed Vampirella to her own deepest and darkest secrets – Vampirella herself (shown in a special story within a story in this very issue)!
